summary: Product-minded software engineer with 14+ years of experience designing cloud-native systems and leading cross-functional teams. Strong background in distributed architecture, frontend and backend delivery, and practical AI integrations. Known for turning ambiguous requirements into reliable, maintainable platforms that scale with business growth.

highlights: Led platform modernization from monolith to domain-aligned services, reducing deployment time by 65%.
Introduced a unified design system and frontend architecture that improved feature delivery predictability.
Built AI-assisted support workflows that reduced first-response time by 38%.
Mentored 9 engineers across backend, frontend, and DevOps tracks.
Designed an event-driven order pipeline processing 2M+ events per day with strong observability.
Owned checkout reliability initiatives that improved conversion by 11% and lowered incident rate.
Implemented performance budgets and CI checks to keep critical pages under target load times.
Developed secure APIs for lending and risk tools used by internal analyst teams.
Migrated legacy services to containerized deployments with blue/green rollout patterns.
Partnered with compliance teams to harden audit trails and reduce reporting gaps.
Built client-facing web applications using React and Node.js for media and retail customers.
Improved API response times by introducing caching and query optimization strategies.
Contributed to reusable internal tooling for authentication and deployment templates.
Implemented features and bug fixes across .NET services and SQL-backed internal tools.
Automated manual reporting tasks with scripts that saved multiple hours weekly for operations teams.
